QuestData.Title: Befouled No More
QuestData.Description: Can you sense it? The taint is already lifting from this building.$b$bA holy building wants to be holy, and villains like Rohan and the rest of his Scarlet scum only hold it back.$b$bWith the abbey secure, we are a step closer to taking Tyr's Hand. Report the results of our strike to Angela. She should be leading the charge on the cathedral from somewhere in the center of town.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Archmage Angela Dosantos at Tyr's Hand in Eastern Plaguelands.
QuestData.RewardText: Good, the abbey is ours. I never doubted Eligor's ability for a moment.
